title: Pair of Shoes for Bound Feet
description: lined slipper style with green tufted ball at toe; silk floral patterned tape in blue green and rose on yellow; boot a: base fabric is blue; boot b: base fabric is light green; black edging at toe and ankle opening; white cotton stiff stitch sole in pear shape; tied together
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
